mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) FROM COMTN_BBS_MASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BBS_USE d ON a.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_CMMNTY e ON d.TRGET_ID = e.CMMNTY_ID WHERE 1=1
AND a.BBS_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND b.CODE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.BBS_ID , a.BBS_TY_CODE , b.CODE_NM AS "bbsTyCodeNm" , a.BBS_INTRCN , a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS "bbsAttrbCodeNm" , a.BBS_NM , a.TMPLAT_ID , d.TMPLAT_NM , d.TMPLAT_COURS , a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT , a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER AS "posblAtchFileNumber" , a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE AS "posblAtchFileSize" , a.REPLY_POSBL_AT , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , e.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , f.USE_AT , f.TRGET_ID FROM COMTN_BBS_MASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_TMPLAT_INFO d ON a.TMPLAT_ID = d.TMPLAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER e ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = e.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BBS_USE f ON a.BBS_ID = f.BBS_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId}

SELECT b.BBS_ID AS "bbsId" , b.BBS_TY_CODE AS "bbsTyCode" , b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE AS "bbsAttrbCode" , b.BBS_NM AS "bbsNm" , b.TMPLAT_ID AS "tmplatId" FROM COMTN_BBS_USE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BBS_MASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID WHERE a.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.PUBLIC_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.BBS_ID ASC

SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) FROM COMTN_BBS_MASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.BBS_ID NOT IN (SELECT BBS_ID FROM COMTN_BBS_USE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y')
AND a.BBS_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND b.CODE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
